website_summaries.verdict: Great durable option for hammock campers with a high quality at half the cost.
pros: Made of high end parachute nylon for extra strength
Comes in a single (4 1/2 feet) and double width (6 1/2 feet)
Includes two long 8-foot ropes for attaching to trees
Includes carabiners needed for getting your hammock up easily
Can carry a lot of weight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from an American company (but still made in China)
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Wise Owl hammock, and it's even nicer than the first, which is excellent. I love the straps (I wish straps like these had been included with the original, but that was a pretty good while ago) and I like the follow-up from Wise Owl regarding questions, etc. I was a little disappointed to discover it's made in China instead of in the US, where the company is headquartered and the products are designed, but perhaps that's the only way to keep the price so competitive. It's just as good, if not better than 3-letter brands you can find in stores for at least twice its price.
customer_reviews.author: WirelessMike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hammock!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly awesome!! My BF has a couple of ENO and I've enjoyed lounging in them so bought this one for myself. We both agree the quality is fantastic and rivals any of the other top brands. Easy to put up with the straps. Now if I can just get him out of it :-)
customer_reviews.author: dkamper

customer_reviews.title: RIPS IN 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in August last year. 6 months later it ripped. Now have to buy a replacement. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Need a lightweight and super simple set up hammock?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Lightweight -Durable -Easy to set up -Comfortable -Packable -Good value The Bad: -None The Bottom Line: We have 2 trees in our front yard that are 10 feet apart from each other. I realized during this Covid pandemic that a hammock would be perfect between the trees. This Wise Owl outfitters hammock is perfect. It is packable and can be stuffed into itself in the bag. It is super lightweight and easy to set up. There are 2 straps which go around the tree and you simply hook the caribaner to the straps. The hammock itself is very comfortable and stable. Overall, I would highly recommend this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped as soon as he sat in it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my boyfriend for his birthday and, it ripped as soon as he sat in it! Right out the box! This product claimed to hold up to 400 pounds. My boyfriend is only 230. Not satisfied. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: All good...from the seller to the hammock. Daughter loves her new reading hang out spot. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Extra for Straps
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, and triple stitched. This is the one for bigger guys.The only problem I have is no straps. Most hammock companies give you straps instead of the rope. You can order them extra, 20 bucks, which I thought was pricey, but once I got them they are heavy duty and I doubt I will ever have to replace them. The hammock itself is fantastic, so don't worry about the quality it is a very good hammock. All in all, I would spend my money on the straps again, they are worth every penny. I just believe they could put in a smaller strap instead of the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Thing ripped the very first time I sat in it. Because the return window had closed, I couldn’t return it. Spend a few bucks more and go with a trusted brand like Eno. This one is a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: golf_n_stuff_slo

customer_reviews.title: Long hammock with appealing colors, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I weigh 295lbs and am 6-8" and enjoy the extra length. The color scheme is very appealing. The attached photo is next to my Eno double nest hammock. The pack size is very similar. 2 years later, its now my goto hammock over my eno. I sleep in it nearly every night. I have found that wearing shoes or jeans with metal studs or rivets is often the culprit for hammock tears.
customer_reviews.author: Flow-Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they say. Trust me
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 14 year old as part of his easter. First time he layed in it on our back patio while we were sitting outside. He turned to get up it ripped all through center. He got maybe 10 minutes of use out of it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sheila s.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock and customer service, but....
customer_reviews.text: The hammock itself is very comfortable and setup is easy. The straps that go around the tree are not durable and during the first use with my wife, the stitching broke (we weigh 325lbs combined). We contacted the company and they shipped a replacement out right away (customer service was great). For a little extra, we would have paid for better straps. Looking at the reviews, that seems to be the case with this and other hammocks. Don't let this steer you away from this product. Things break and the company responded quickly to fix the problem, however the stitching did break and we are no where near the straps weight limit of 500lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock but had one problem
customer_reviews.text: Used the hammock for the first time last weekend and it was so nice to have. I went with the two person one although it’s not very comfy with two people in it unless your sitting side by side or maybe laying opposite ways. When we laid in it the first time one of the seams of the tree straps busted so we had to readjust and hook to another loop in the tree strap. Didn’t have any other problems after that but was kind of surprised the seam busted on the first use. Hopefully the tree strap holds out for awhile. Im glad these are made in the USA. Definitely was great to have to nap while camping.
customer_reviews.author: marcus carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: It only took about two days before tiny holes began to appear. They were about the size of a large grain of rice. Had about 5 of them spread out and the sides began to have strings fraying out. I've attached a couple of photos of the holes. I would probably look at this purchase as a "one-time-use" hammock for one vacation. Then discard to the trash. It would be too dangerous to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own this hammock...
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 2 of these and absolutely love them. I have recommended this brand and every single time we are asked if we are happy with it, we let them lay in it because the product speaks for itself. If you are reading this then you are researching as we did, you can stop researching and just hit buy it now. You wont regret it. And if customer service is a concern, rest assured its covered by a professional staff that will help with any questions/concerns. Fyi keep 1 in the car, you will be surprised how many places are perfect for a quick set up..
customer_reviews.author: FELIX ALVARADO

customer_reviews.title: Love this hammock!
customer_reviews.text: We hike, a lot! I was tired of sitting on logs that were infested by ants but after hiking a while, you want to stop for lunch and relax, so the hammock came into play. This hammock is AWESOME!!! It is so easy to put up and so refreshing to lay in! I love that the bag is attached to the hammock (that it's stored in) because when the hammock is up, I use that as my drink/snack holder. I highly recommend this product and I love that it's made here in the USA!! Thanks Wise Owl!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Not as quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: The little bag that attaches to the hammock is not durable at all, and is coming detached. I cannot stuff the hammock into it as it is too small and apparently, cannot take the pressure without ripping off. It’s hanging on my a literal thread. Can I get a replacement or a refund? Update No response from Amazon or Wise Owl. I guess this product does not have a warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Gustomer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped and bottom out first time sitting on it.
customer_reviews.text: My first hammock is a Eno hammock, and the first time setting up between two trees I accidentally bottom out, but there was zero rips on it. I even scrapped it many times after that, and still no rips. However, first time setting up the hammock, it ripped instantly. It also it really uncomfortable and not that soft.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Legit, fun, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, I tested almost 400 pounds in this hammock, no problem. Tip: It’s a bit more comfortable sitting sideways, so you don’t feel like you’re lying in the bottom of a taco shell. For a permanent installation, a hammock with “sticks” at either end to flatten the shape would be better. But this is great for taking with you on the hikes, easily setting up in green spaces near your house for a couple hours, etc. The included straps make it easy as pie (actually much easier than pie) to set up, without needing to tie any knots. Well worth the reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: W. Tersch

customer_reviews.title: Lacks adequate instructions
customer_reviews.text: I do like the hammock & will keep it. The only problem I had is there were no instructions on how to tie the ends to the trees. Obviously you can simply tie a knot & jump in, but using a secure knot designed for hammock use somehow seems more appropriate. I had seen some techniques on the net, but didn't bother to note them as I assumed there would be an instructional on knotting. That being said there are instructions on getting in safely & how high it should be from the ground, but that's about it. It's a nicely made product & I do recommend it. -1 star for lack of complete instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I am Definitely going to be life long customer!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Phenomenal customer service! I purchased the pink and gray hammock and there were a few lose threads. I emailed asking what do do about them since pulling or burning them isnt a great idea. They decided to send me another one and apologized. Great hammock, feels well-made and straps feel very sturdy/durable. I really love the yellow hammock but the it doesn't come in a one person. I purchased it anyways thinking it wouldn't be too big, I was wrong. It wraps me up like i'm in a cocoon. Sadly, I'll be returning it in exchange for a small one in a different color. I would also like to mention the businesses great and amiable customer service.
customer_reviews.author: NOPE

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was undecided on this vs the ENO so I bought one of each. I feared I would be getting what I paid for and had higher expectations of the ENO. After the first use side by side for a 1 week camping trip the ENO is fraying on an edge with threads coming out. I'll update here if this one fails but perfect so far! And with everything you need included in the price this is an excellent deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Super light yet heavy duty - we bought 3 more!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER happy with the styling, quality and how compact it is when in the storage bag. This will be coming with us on all kinds of trips. There's never a worry the hammock won't hold my weight, and it's made my time in quarantine in my backyard that much nicer. After seeing how amazing this was, we bought 3 more! HIGHLY recommended. Oh, and this size is perfect for one person, a little tight for 2. However, don't get the two-person model if you'll only be occasionally in it with 2 people. This one-person model is good, but it does wrap around you a bit. I can't imagine a single person laying in the one for two people. =D
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL HAMMOCK!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a Hammock in the back 1/2 acre of my property 24/7 year round. Found some time ago that vinyl hammock does best for me. The Wise Owl hammock is GREAT! Vinyl is nice because I can dump dry debris out before getting in the hammock. OR I can dump water if it rained the night or day before! Dries really quickly. Very sturdy construction. It's only been a week or so.... Coronavirus drama takes up MUCH of my time (even though I'm home restricted for work and voluntary home-bound). But I find at least a short time each day that I can go out and sit in my hammock and read! STAY SAFE. Tod Stewart
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good way to get the kids outdoor to study
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter who reported to us that this is a "must have' for her college experience. Good way to get the kids outdoor to study, relax, etc. Great little thing and easy to put up and take down. The bag makes it easy to store it all in one place and small enough to stick in the backpack. If you want to put a smile on your college bound student, this is the ticket. They may look at you funny, but when they see others doing it, it will all make sense. Was a really good way to get them to stay outdoors as long as the weather permitted.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN O.

customer_reviews.title: Made my camping trip a success
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock! Took it as a sleeping backup to my truck tent but ended up sleeping both nights in the hammock. When I had to leave, it took 20min to pack up! Comfortable and sturdy. Bug net is a must in most areas. I used a lightweight comforter as an under and oversheet but didn’t like how it slid around and bunched up. Would happen with any hammock. You don’t need a large pillow - just take a small one or roll up a pair of shorts or your comforter. Would be good to have printed instructions for setup since I was in an area without internet or cell signal.
customer_reviews.author: Taufiq Habib

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Lightweight.  Big & comfy.  USA made
customer_reviews.text: We're just average-size people, but we like the size of this hammock. It's plenty big enough for the two of us and easily holds 350 lbs. Surprisingly easy to get in and out of. Super nice lightweight material--parachute-like--that is not too hot or too cold to the touch--very very comfortable and soft. Very compact. The straps are long enough for many situations, but in case trees are further apart, I highly recommend an extra 20 feet of straps. We found that mosquitoes bit us right through this lightweight material, so buying a mosquito net as well is a must! Great weight for backpacking!
customer_reviews.author: TriplePurple

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for tall folks due to longitudinal 0seams
customer_reviews.text: Everything needed to hang a hammock. I am 6'4", this hammock is not made for tall people. The best way for me to lay in a hammock is at an angle. The longitudinal seams in this hammock make that very uncomfortable. I don't understand why they didn't make it from one piece of material. The seams make this a 1 star but I gave it 2 because they do provide the straps and carabiners. I have an 11' hammock for camping and bought this one (9') to hang up at my house for relaxing. Hard to relax with this type construction. Probably be good for my 5'4" wife. I should have paid attention to other reviews. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: mark harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little hammocks in a compact bag!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these during the COVID-19 "stay at home" time in California and our three adult children have enjoyed them immensely. Super easy to put up and take down!! They even take them to our neighborhood pool area to kick back and relax in the shade. They can follow the shade when it's hot and follow tIt our neighborhood pool area to kick back and relax in the shade. They are SO portable!They can follow the shade when it's hot and follow the sun when it's not. They are very well-made and sturdy. Incredible price for a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an affordable hammock to use with an existing set up between two trees, so we didn't use the straps that came with this kit. I wanted something durable for my kids and comfortable for me to read a book in. This seems to fit both goals! Three kids have piled into it at one time and it's held up well so far. The blue color is very pretty in our yard and the hammock is easy for me to take inside for when it rains. I don't even bother packing it into the bag, just fold it up easily. The travel bag comes attached to the actual hammock. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Cubs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our kids for Christmas. That day, they were able to set them up in the back yard and have been using them ever since. They are pretty rough and so far they have put the hammocks through a lot. The strap that connects to the tree, the string attatched already broke but it is still usable. We would def purchase these again should one not last long with the crazy kids!
customer_reviews.author: kteele

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is a great value, and is made well. I've had a couple of other brands and this one is done right. The stuff pocket is sized so the included straps fit in with the hammock nicely. They use webbing at the ends of the hammock instead of cord, and that will help both strength and durability. It feels a little heavier that my previous double hammock, but it also has a higher weight rating so I don't have a problem with that. Nothin' wrong with bein' strong! Looking forward to some very "socially distanced" trips with this hammock later in the year.
customer_reviews.author: Mr_Wes

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot
customer_reviews.text: Costumer service really is as great as everyone else is saying. I recieved a hammock with loose threads, contacted the seller and they apologized. Sent me a free replacement without me needing to return my other damaged one! If you are worried about getting a defected hammock, don't worry. This company really does have your back. It is truly 100% guarantee satisfaction. And yes, the hammock is awesome also. It's texture is nice and soft to the touch, it's easy to pack, carry and set up. Super easy to store without taking much space. And the color, oh my god its vibrant is beautiful. I'm going to be using this hammock constantly once spring time hits and I can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Sly buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic hammocks. I bought a single originally, but I felt the sticking between the colors of fabric cut me a little wrong, so I decided to get the double in hopes that it would be a bit more comfortable. It's *definitely* large enough for two people, but a bit big for one! It's still really great for sitting sideways in rather than laying out flat like you would normally use a hammock. The fabric is really nice and comfortable to lay in and it's very lightweight and strong, as well as being extremely easy to set up and pack away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Iscariot

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for tall men.  Questionable quality.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of the 9'4.5" by 6' hammocks. After the taller one set up his hammock and got into it, his feet and head were up on the gathered area near the knots. So, if you are really tall, I'd recommend getting the longer, wider one. Also, it didn't feel like thicker, durable nylon but thinner, cheaper material. He felt it might tear with too much movement. The sewing along the sides was poorly done and it began fraying right away. After seeing this, the second one didn't even unpack his. So, we'll need to send them back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: opparkerco

customer_reviews.title: I really don't know what to say here
customer_reviews.text: I received this and the accompanying bug net a few days ago but had to wait for a day without rain to try it. I originally bought it with the intention of adding it to my emergency preparedness bag I liked the quilty, small size and convenience so much that I just bought another set for my everyday use. My only issue is a very very small one and that is the attached stuff sack for the hammock doesn't have a compression strap like the bug net has. All and all I am very pleased with my purchases and will definitely recommend Wize Owl products.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Collector

customer_reviews.title: Put to the test!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I bought these hammock's for our camping outings and they've been awesome! Not only are they super comfy to take a nap and relax, but our kids and their friends piled into the hammock and used it as a swing. While this was not the intent of buying the hammock's I have to say they held up great after being put to the test by 6 kids! I thought the hammock was going to be ruined after being used and abused by the kids for three straight days, but after a quick wash they're like new. You can't beat the price and the durability of these hammock's - I would absolutely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rainerrp

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up and so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter after my 7 year old son received a blue double one from grandparents for his birthday. We couldn’t be happier with them! Super easy to set up and so comfy! We had hoped the double would work for both kids but they argued the whole time so we decided to get this single for my daughter. She loves having her own and now I get to enjoy the double with my son. We have set these up in our yard several times and can’t wait to take them camping. I haven’t tried other brands to compare but so far, these are perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: shannon7708

customer_reviews.title: A great option for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these and the day after it arrived, we bought another one. They go up super easy and everything you need is in there for a great price. The straps are extremely long (if anything, too long). There are a dozen ways we can hang them in our back yard. I can't really speak to the durability because we've only had ours a couple weeks. My only criticism is that between my two purchases, the seller probably sent me at least 6 emails asking for feedback. This is a pet peeve of mine. I was very happy with the product but lost some love for the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to use in the summer.
customer_reviews.text: I don't get it. Maybe because I bought the larger version. It was easy to set-up, but once you get in you are entrapped completely. You can't see anything once you are in, like any typical hammock. It is summer and you are just in there sweating because it is so big it covers over top of you, like you are in a cocoon. I want to try a smaller one and hope that's the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter last month. Immediately after the purchase, someone from Wise Owl sent a message to make sure that everything was okay with the order. I responded that it had snowed recently, so my daughter hadn't had a chance to use it. From there I had a couple very nice exchanges with the person. There are no problems with the one we purchased but I am very confident that if there had been it would have been dealt with properly. Last week my daughter finally had a chance to use it and said that it is a very good product. And, yes, ours came with straps.
customer_reviews.author: EPN004

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking hammock
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking hammock. Strong, lightweight fabric. Solid, tree-safe straps with loops for adjusting length. Packs down to about the size of a large grapefruit and weighs only a few pounds. I pack this, a book and some snacks and get myself some downtime deep in the green. The built-in stuff sack also doubles a drink holder. :) The hammock runs a little narrow. I'm 5'8" and 150 pounds and it's perfect for me. But some of the reviewers here say the double might be better for larger people. But this was a steal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great substitution for a porch swing
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a porch swing for years and not finding what I wanted, this hammock is the solution. It fits perfectly in the corner of our porch and can double as a seated swing. It was much less money than a porch swing, and more comfortable. I’ll be ordering another for our deck. I don’t know why my picture is upside down.🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. We got the blue one. It is super easy to put up (my daughter is 15 years old and she had no problem doing it on her own) and looks great. It also is super small when rolled up and packed in its carrying bag, so this it very portable. I cannot attest to the durability as we have only had it for a week, but we intend to follow the advise of some reviewers and not get in it with shoes. Will update review if I notice anything worth reporting. :-) All and all, a great product and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Malaga

customer_reviews.title: Ummm, Pretty much the perfect hammock!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a hammock for ages. This came so quickly (despite the covid19 shutdowns), is reasonably priced, and soooo comfortable!!! I bought the double hammock in navy with turquoise for a pop of color. It has everything you need including instructions-even though it’s super easy to put up. It truly does allow for two adults to lay in it at the same time. The material is strong but soft and lightweight. Why didn’t I buy this sooner?!?!?!? 😌 What a great company too~they communicated every step of the way. Let’s support the small family owned businesses! 👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Rooonthecoo

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock, One issue
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have had my hammock a few weeks now, and so far I love it. The colors are great, The included tree straps are great, Material is great, The carabiners on the other hand, are not so great. After a few weeks of HEAVY use, one decided to bend and render it rather unsafe to use until I get more. Not a huge deal because they sell them here on amazon relatively inexpensive, but still definitely worth noting in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Foster

customer_reviews.title: Just had an amazing experience
customer_reviews.text: Went on a kayak overnight on the Allegheny River in PA. First time doing this sort of rustic camping. I got the Wise Owl Hammock, bug net, and rain fly. It was easy to set up, really comfortable to sleep in, and compact to store and carry. I was a little concerned because I've always tented, but I don't think I'm going to go back. I loved the experience, and NO BUG BITES!! I will need to get a pad of some sort for insulation. I was cold, but that was my own fault. this equipment was exactly what I'd been looking for, and for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rice

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought five of these - one for myself and 4 as graduation gifts for my friends. I have already spent so much time in this thing - whether it be reading, scrolling through TikTok, or napping. It is lightweight and seems relatively durable, depending on your body weight. I weigh 130 pounds so I can get away with tying it to pretty much any tree. Also, one of my friends said she loves it and it's one of the best gifts she's ever received. She's been eating breakfast in it, stargazing in it, and more. So yeah, 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: unknown consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first hammock. We purchased for day hikes and camping. We didn't buy to sleep in at night, more day time naps and reading. This hammock is very well made and compresses well. It is strong and breathable to an extent. The reason for the 4 star rating. We purchased both - straps and hammock from Wise Owl. The instructions were horrible and when you search on YouTube you find reviews but poor instruction. A simple tutorial is all that is needed. I do recommend the straps by Wise Owl...high quality. UPDATE: Updated to 5 stars. I sent an email to Wise Owl customer service and they shared several instructions documents for all scenarios. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: TechMind

customer_reviews.title: Straps don't have enough loops
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several hammocks, having high hopes for this one being one of the pricier ones. I love all the different colors it comes in but while it seems to be very well made, the straps, that accompany it, only have 5 loops each which severely limits where and how you can hang the hammock. I didn't realize this and just now saw several reviews that also mention it. In comparison, the other hammocks I ordered have 16 (!) loops on each strap. This one goes back. Thanks to amazon for free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Tears after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the second wise owl hammock that I purchased for my backyard. First one that tore I was sure was from my son swinging on it too hard if that's even a thing. The second one he just went to lay on it and I witnessed him fall right through when it ripped under his butt and he landed on his back. I'm not sure why these just keep ripping randomly but I am attempting to reach the seller. It's cute and a great colorful addition to my backyard. But this will be the last one I buy. Lasted 3 months again.
customer_reviews.author: StefDome

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight in shoulders!! Especially compared to fellow Campers
customer_reviews.text: I was examining my friends hammocks after a terrible knight in the Wise Owl. Thiers was much more roomy and flat bottomed. Wish id knew. I did buy the single but its like youth and kind constricting and squished. look for one that's more flat on bottom. maybe mine was defective.
customer_reviews.author: camper 38

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to the run of the mill rope backyard hammocks
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up! I’m using it as a backyard hammock. I had been purchasing rope backyard hammocks but year after year they’d fall apart. Therefore I decided to look into getting a camping hammock. While I was a little bit skeptical about the ropes since usually use chains that are drilled into a tree they turned out to be snug as a rug! One disclaimer I’d say is if you’re claustrophobic this may not be the product for you. I’m 5’0 and when I fully lay down in the hammock the fabric almost covers my whole face. It definitely gives you a cocoon feeling that while works for me may not work for others!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Simple, compact
customer_reviews.text: Great simple hammock, love how compact it is, taking up practically zero space for storage / packing. Very fast and easy setup. I'd suggest having extra paracord on hand for those wider spaced tree areas - this kit doesn't account for much variance. Not a great pick for southern heat & humidity use as the fabric is a great wind blocker so whatever relief the breeze is trying to give - you get nothing. Looking forward to using these in cooler temps / climate.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Zarback

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock! (but needs instructions included)
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock! This is the first hammock we’ve ever owned and we love it. So easy to set up! My only complaint is that the instructions are online. Our first time using it, we were at a campground with no cell service so we had to wait until we ran an errand back in town to look up instructions. The instructions online weren’t even applicable to the hammock we bought (online mentions making knots and our hammock just wraps through itself and has loops to clip into). So in the end, we had to figure it out ourselves anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what i wanted at s great price!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and is a great quality hammock. It took me less than 5 minutes to hang and feels very secure. My grand-daughter and I fit perfectly and it was just as easy to stuff back in the attached bag when we were ready to move on. I wish the straps had a few more loop, that would give me more options when searching for the right set of trees. I like the color options snd have just ordered another on so that i can lounge solo on our next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: My "Go To" hammock
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wise Owl Outfitters hammock! It is big, comfortable and I feel safe in it. I love that it has straps connected to the carabiner instead of ropes for added strength. I use this with a PSY hammock bug net and have fallen asleep in it many times. I take it up to the family cabin all the time. When I am not using it, someone else is always sneaking on it. I have had the Wise Owl Outfitters hammock for about a year now and it has held up nicely. If you are in the market for a hammock, this Wise Owl Outfitters hammock is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this purchase. The quality is really good and the provided straps work great (the more expensive competitor product requires separate purchase of straps). We recently used the two-person model for two people and it worked great. Everything you need to immediately hang it up comes in the bag and it all packs away nicely for later. The two-person hammock has sort of a divider seam that creates two pods. The material is really strong and pleasantly light. It is a little jarring putting your full weight on it at first because it is thin enough that it seems like it should rip, but it doesn't. Great product and a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pbreagin

customer_reviews.title: Get up!! It's momma's turn! Love this hammock! So does my 10 y/o... gonna need @ least one more!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primarily for myself! I can barley get in it because of my 10 year old! Absolutely loving & enjoying this hammock! We have it in our backyard among several beautiful mature tree's. How relaxing and calming, especiallyy at a time like this...'sheltering in place'. We just recently purchased it but I'm very impressed & satisfied already! The color is vibrant and the fabric seems to be of very good quality. It rained a good bit the other day & the thin fabric dried quickly and nicely! The fabric texture has a parachute type feel to it. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: sjb

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is an amazing value! I have an Eno Single Nest and Eno straps that I love, but they are pricey! This hammock works just as well for less than half the price AND includes straps and carabiners! The straps don't have as many loops on them as the Enos, but this is only an issue with smaller trees. It's also easily solved by wrapping the strap around an extra time.
customer_reviews.author: amanda zito

customer_reviews.title: Good hammock at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We have a few hammocks in our family, and this one is just as good as our more expensive one, especially since it came with the hanging straps. Only con is that I wish the straps had a little more adjustability. More other set of straps can be clipped on the entire length of the strap. However, I paid as much for those straps as this entire set cost. Plus, they need their own separate bag. So for compactness and price, this is for sure they way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with strings for straps
customer_reviews.text: Hammock came with 2 small strings for straps instead of the listed ones with multiple hoops. The strings can barely fit around an average tree trunk and have no attachment points so you have to be skilled at judging the distance you need to make a loop on the string to hook up the carabiners.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Niiiiiiiiice!
customer_reviews.text: As an ultralight backpacker on a budget, this and the wise owl canopy was my attempt to not sleep on the ground & not spend $600 for an ultralight tent. At the same weight (hammock, stakes, & canopy) as the Big Agnes Tigerwall, but at less than $100 for everything. Gave three stars for comfort. It is a single hammock after all. I've hammock camped for years & so far this has been the nicest set up I've had. I live in New Mexico, so sometimes trees are scarce depending on the location. If you want light weight & inexpensive, I recommend this hammock & canopy set up.
customer_reviews.author: fundabug

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying for some outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is really cool and very easy to assemble. I purchased the 2 person Hammock, however the strings were not long enough to fit around the two trees. My trees are the right distance from each other but one tree is really big so the other cord wouldn’t wrap all the way around it. Other than that it is a really great hammock and great addition to our backyard, also a great price. I recommend this hammock to anyone looking for a good durable hammock.
customer_reviews.author: QueenNesha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hammock!!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on which Hammock to get. I settled on the Wise Owl single person hammock. I’ve never used one before so I was a little nervous if it was going to be difficult to set up. IT WASN’T! When it arrived it was so easy and intuitive to use. You really can’t mess it up. I do wish it came with more adjustable straps though- but I wouldn’t even call that a full complaint bc I just get creative. Not sure if there is different hardware you could get to better adjust... Over all, it’s super comfortable, lightweight, and easy to pack and unpack. I’d buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory SC

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: I took my hammock on a family camping trip, and now have to buy 2 more! Lol. We all enjoyed it so much, especially my wife and daughter. If we were just around the campsite relaxing, my wife and daughter were taking turns in the hammock because they loved it so much. I already told them they could pick out the colors they wanted and they would get them as a Xmas gift. It being the first time using a hammock like this, it did take a couple of tries before I got it to hang right. But, I chalk that up to my inexperience and by no means a deficiency with the hammock. I would definitely recommend this hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays put, dries quick
customer_reviews.text: Although we live in a very wooded area, we didn't have the "perfect" spacing between trees for a traditional hammock. This is perfect for us! We were able to extend the ties so that the hammock hangs securely between two slightly further apart trees. It's been hanging there since mid August with no adjustments needed (it is now late October), despite many people of many different weights in and out of it, changing weather, storms, winds, etc. Dries very quickly since the fabric is parachute-like.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.

customer_reviews.title: Small tears upon opening- (Updated Review!!)
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it up from the packaging and it has 2 small tears in it. So disappointing. **Update** Lauren, from Customer Service, responded to me immediately upon my email to the company in regards to the 2 small tears. She was extremely pleasant to speak with and she shipped me a brand new hammock that I received within 2 days. I've been laying in my hammock daily since I received it and I absolutely love it! It is very comfy and durable. It was easy to set up after watching a 1 minute You Tube video. Thanks to Lauren, I will purchase more Wise Owl products!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: Love my double wise owl hammock. It’s super confterble and superb quality. I have a couple of friend who own ENO hammocks and they says it’s litteraly the same exact product, I just paid way less then what they paid. ( the payed for the company name) I bought the full wise owl set up. Aluminum carabiners, rainfly, snugnet and treestraps. Could have asked for a better product. Here’s a video of setting up the hammock with the trees taps carabiners and of course my double wise
customer_reviews.author: Francisco D.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and as advertised. I'm newly retired and thought it would be a good accessory for my new position in life. The directions were user friendly and I was able to hang it up in a relatively short time. The fabric is very soft, but it does seem to be quite durable. As far as comfort goes, I was able to zone out for a good hour the first time I tried it out. I would highly recommend this item to anyone who likes to chill outside. It would also make a GREAT retirement gift for someone!
customer_reviews.author: Helen W.

customer_reviews.title: These straps are thin thin thin and no loops
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it’s very thin and small ( the single) the straps are not durable nor secure for me . Maybe for my 10/9 years old boys. I think the company should do a better job in having durable tree hugging straps. My oaks are wide and big. So I had to purchase more stronger tree hugger straps !
customer_reviews.author: She is Private

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Just came back from an overnight kayak fishing trip on the South Branch of the Potomac River in WV. I decided to try the Wise Owl double hammock to cut down on weight and pack size. This was my first time hammock camping and I must say it was more comfortable than a tent. A foam sleeping pad made it even better for warmth. Overall a great choice. Easy setup, very comfortable and packed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bt

customer_reviews.title: Durable high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock highly impressed with the material and the hold of the strap! My husband put it up part on a tree and the other part attached to a hook on the side of the garage. At first I was afraid to sit thinking I would fall but my husband reassured me these straps are heavy duty and could hold 2 ppl on the hammock with no problem. The material is perfect, looks great in the yard and very comfortable! Definitely recommend you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna C

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of experience with camping type hammocks, but this was very easy to put up and seems sturdy and comfy-- easy-instructions for the hanging straps are found on their website. The straps are long enough I suppose...make sure you measure the circumference of the tree and add that into the length of strap you need. I made that mistake and had to find a different location or buy longer straps...Overall decent hammock for a cheap price. I'll update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Outnumbered

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product that is easy to use and easy to pack up. Would definitely recommend and buy again. Has been lovely to set up by the lake to escape the summer heat. Extremely comfortable for 1-person use, 2-person definitely depends on the size and relative weight of the people. If the two people are of similar weight, lying side to side is a good option. If the weight difference is greater, I’ve found lying/sitting with the longer/heavier person parallel to the hammock with the shorter/lighter person perpendicular (as a means to fully open up the width of the hammock) to be much more comfortable than trying to lie side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So simple, So fun!
customer_reviews.text: love it... strong... lightweight, two of us tested it out at the lake the other night - perfect with plenty of room for two. I am 6' 190 - she's 5'5' 125 - had it set up in literally 10min and we were chillin' like two peas in a pod. Nice breeze, birds chirpin'... you get the picture. I've had ENO's also - more expensive and in my humble opinion no better made than the Wise Owl. Plus family business... I'll support that always... quick ship on schedule... light as a feather for the backpack with tiny footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this hammock. I got a double and it was a good comfortable size with a material that let the breeze in. But after just 4 months, the fabric cables ripped on my son (he's less than 130 lbs). It ripped in one of the longer adjusting holes so I just put the carabiner in a tighter one past the tear, but in two days it ripped again on a place it must've been already wearing out on the other side. So now it's completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: codfish mon

customer_reviews.title: Yay for this hammock
customer_reviews.text: We love our hammock. I love how big it is. I wouldn’t put two adults in it regularly. It was easy to hang and came with the straps. I love the color too! It’s easy to store in its little back and the pocket is nice too. Because we have the double when you’re a single in it you’re definitely wrapped up. Sometimes hanging my legs out over each side allows me not to feel so enclosed, as well as get more breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cench624

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First we ordered one of these (Single size) for our nephew and after seeing how easy it was to set up and how awesome it was, we ordered two for ourselves. I love coming home after a day of hard work, setting up my hammock and basking in the summer sunshine, reading a book, listening to music and throwing a tennis ball with my dog. I love how comfortable it is on your back or your side and you can even sit in it like a swing! We are taking it with us to the mountains in a few days for our family get together. A great addition to our home (and away) oasis.
customer_reviews.author: E. Maillet

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hammock! Enough room for two kids and myself. Very easy to set up my 9 year old helped me with it. Very compact and easy to throw in a backpack or hook it on to backpack! The Wise Owl family reached out to me before my shipment even came offering advice and welcoming me to the family! I was thankful for this! Love this hammock super comfy and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a small price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made, durable hammock. I purchased my whole hammock system from Wise Owl, and couldn't be happier. If I could go back and change anything, I would purchase the double instead of the single. With my last setup (not the one that is pictured), I didn't have ideal tree spacing, so I kept ending up having one of my legs hanging out...but that really isn't the hammock's fault. This is really easy to hang, especially if you buy the straps with more loops on them. My whole system ends up weighing around the same as my tent (not a super light one, but not terrible to carry).
customer_reviews.author: Juli Levine

customer_reviews.title: Blown away by the value
customer_reviews.text: When I came across these hammocks and saw the price, I instantly thought "cheap crap." But then I saw the near flawless review score and the thousands of reviews, so my curiosity was piqued and I decided to take a chance. I ordered one for my wife and myself, and I was very pleasantly surprised when these came in. Easy to set up, deceptively durable, and packs into a pouch not much bigger than a coke can. I can't recommend Wise Owl Outfitters hammocks enough.
customer_reviews.author: SGM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our ripped hammock. It's awesome, it's really long & wide so if you are tall this is for you. My boyfriend is 6'1 & he has room to stretch out. We are using it on a stand & it's perfect. The color is just as pictured & it came with the straps to hang on a tree. Definitely worth it. Update both me & my boyfriend sit on it together no problems at all. Together we are about 430lbs. He loves it after a long day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: What a great Hammock!
customer_reviews.text: You can just put it into your bag and have with you as you walk through the parks or the forest. Takes 2-3 minutes to put up and you always have a place to rest or read a book. I got a large and a small and both are excellent. Green/yellow is my favourite as it blends naturally with the trees. Grey/pink is also very nice. Between the two sizes, I have a slight preference for the large one as it does not weight that much more but you can wrap yourself in it. Excellent hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how roll it to get the hammock back into the attached bag it came with. also no instructions on how to actually attach it to a tree. There is a website to look at for instructions and they were terrible. Tried figuring out how to tie a double surgeons knot but no idea if its correct and will damage the materials. The attached instructions in the package give you detailed instructions on how to sit down in a hammock. Really useless if you can’t properly get the thing setup without accidentally destroying it in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Melani Sukanen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for well working hammock, especially for first time hammockers!
customer_reviews.text: First time using a hammock, and this was perfect! I have had this product for almost a year and have gotten lots of use out of it. It is well made, comfortable, and easy to set up. One issue that someone might find is that the straps are not long enough if you are planning on hammocking between trees too far apart or that have huge trunks. I usually don't have an issue with this though, I have started to have an eye to estimate which spots work best for this hammock. Even then, you can always buy longer straps in addition to this! Would definitely recommend buying this over more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Powers

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: We tried out the double, but it was very large when there was only one person. We ended up returning the double, but really liked the easy of putting it up, the softness and breathability of the fabric, and the compact carrying tote so we purchased the single!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hammock brand
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hammock for a little over 2 years and I've loved every second with it. It's just as good as my ENO was and for this price it can't be beat in my eyes. Extremely comfortable for me and my girlfriend (I'm 5'11 and she's 5'2) with some room to spare. Love it and will continue to buy wise owl hammocks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great hammock. Purchased for my son for Boy Scouts. Unfortunately due to Covid-19 we haven't been able to do boyscouts. Luckily we have trees :) We have set this up multiple times this year already, my son stayed outside and slept in it a few nights already. We purchased the tarp and bug net too. We like it so much we bought one for our nephew and plan to buy three more for our other kids! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pioneerman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lightweight, comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly affordable. Super comfortable. Lightweight. I swapped the carabiners out for some lightweight aluminum ones I had to shave the weight down a few extra ounces. Brought this on a white mtns backpacking trip and slept in it. I found that you get a good hang from having the straps at about 6’ high and between trees about 7-9 normal paces apart. Bought one for my girlfriend too.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material
customer_reviews.text: There was some confusion about what I was ordering and while I thought I was ordering a double, I ended up with a single. This resulted in a much smaller hammock than what I needed so I ended up returning it. Having said that, the material was awful thin. Not as nice as other brands of hammocks I own like Sawtooth. Even had I received a double I likely would have returned it due to the thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Vader540

customer_reviews.title: Cajun Certified!
customer_reviews.text: Currently drinking a natty in my double-wide as I write. She holds you in just the right spots. The straps she came with are thiccer than a regular at your local crawfish shack, they ain’t going no where. I can already see a couple of stray threads, but for the price I wasn’t expecting 600 count sheets. I damn near fell asleep in it the other afternoon, she’s right up there with my recliner. If you’re looking for an affordable hammock that ships quick, this is the one for you partner. Cajun Certified!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the outdoors. He's one that actually gets depressed if it rains for too many days at a time. He works nights so I purchased this hammock for him to take advantage of sunny days to soak in those sunrays. It's still winter, so he's only used it a couple of times when the South forgets and gives us 70* weather! 😉 I can see him using it quite regularly once Spring gets here! He says it's the best sleep this side of his deer stand! LOL
customer_reviews.author: GA Homeschoolers

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Whether it's in a backpack, a bike basket, or tucked into a corner in the car, it's easy to travel with and easy to hang. We've used it at parks, music festivals, on the porch of a rental house, and other random places. Very convenient, but makes you mad when you can't find two trees or poles a decent distance apart where you want to use it. It's held up great so far, so seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Single fits 2 school age skinny boys. Well, one is skinny, the other is average.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it (the single) fits the 2 boys (combined weight under 110lbs). My husband thinks the nearby rock isn’t going to be a problem but they’ve already figured out how to flip inside it (together) so really it’s just a matter of time before we have an ER visit. One’s already fallen out. However, it’s definitely safer than a trampoline. And safer than spending the day inside bothering me to no end. So, winning!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sah

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable, durable
customer_reviews.text: My 16yro put this up and she's never put a hammock or any other type of camping equipment up. Super easy. I dont know if there was instructions on how to make the knots ...but it was really sturdy. Its actually on my patio. I just saw they have the straps with areas to hook the carabiners. Dang it. Any whoooo i think you'll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Supersuzied

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember when I purchased this hammock, maybe 2 years ago. I finally got to put this hammock up because I recently purchased a house that has several trees out back. It's excellent quality. I can lay in it super comfy with my hubby and 5 year old daughter. I highly recommend it!! Also, I got the straps and the mosquito netting all at the same time, no regrets. I recommend purchasing those straps to set it up because it's a lot better and secure than the ropes it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Stuff sack is small and light. Seems pretty durable. We use it on our outdoor hammock stand and only bring it out when we use it. Don't think it would weather the UV Ray's too well if left outside continuously. My wife is 6'2" and I'm about 6' tall and we both fit in this double hammock. Not saying it's super comfy for 2 people of our size, but we can make it work for a snuggly evening to watch the stars at night. Very comfy as a single person hammock. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: t345

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself for a recent camping trip. My kids quickly took it over and played in it for hours. Washed well when we came back home too! This hammock is high quality and I honestly can't tell a difference between this and the super expensive ENOs I see at the sporting goods stores as far as structure and durability. The colors are great, but please oh please start offering the kids' colors in regular size! I need more color options!!! Loved the hammock so much we bought another!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bigger dude 240lb. And had my concerns about a product this lightweight and fits in a tons carry sack - holding me. Though I still sit a bit apprehensively, I’m increasingly more comfortable and impressed by the strength of the product. First order was lost in transit and even though amazon refunded me - wise owl proactively reached out in concern. All is well. This is a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, efficient and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the competition's like, but it's difficult to imagine how their hammocks could be any better. In the 10 days or so I've had this one I've used it four times and found it very easy to set up and more comfortable than a Pawley's Island rope hammock. It repacks easily into it's small pouch (including the straps) and I especially like the fact that the pouch is sewn to the hammock, preventing its loss and also making it useable for storing a few small items (e.g., ipod and headphones) while using the hammock. I'm pretty sure the single, not the double, would be best for a single user. Oh, and it's cheap!
customer_reviews.author: MarcG

product_meta.title: Wise Owl Outfitters Hammock Camping Double & Single with Tree Straps - USA Based Hammocks Brand Gear, Indoor Outdoor Backpacking Survival & Travel, Portable
feature_bullets: Get Outdoors With the Perfect Hammock Setup
UNLIKE OTHER HAMMOCKS ours are made of high quality heavy duty 210T parachute nylon. This extra soft yet super strong material gives you the most comfortable and relaxing experience ever.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - So you don’t have to wonder if you are risking your hard-earned money. If you don’t love it just let us know. We take great pride in taking care of our awesome customers. Don’t take our word for it… just look at our reviews.

WE WON'T EMPTY YOUR WALLET FOR ESSENTIALS! We love the outdoors just like you and we know that the cost of gear can really add up, therefore, we offer the same quality products as other well-known brands for a much more affordable price. Trust us, our gear is just as good! It's also a great multifunctional inexpensive gift for your mom, dad, sister, girlfriend, boyfriend, son, daughter or even the dog :)

LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT - So you can take them anywhere. The SingleOwl (1 person) is 9ft long by 4 1/2 ft wide, weighs 16 oz. and packs down to about the size of a grapefruit. Want a bigger one? Check out our DoubleOwl (2 people) that is 10ft long by 6 1/2 ft wide, weighs only 26 oz. and is about the size of an eggplant so you can just throw it in your backpack and go.

RELAX IMMEDIATELY W/SUPER FAST & EASY SET UP: Tree straps & carabiners are included w/this hammock making set up a breeze. No need to tie any knots. The hammock straps are 9 ft long (not 2 ft like others) and come with 5 separate loops so you can adjust your hammock to the perfect height and comfort level. You can attach them to anything sturdy, like trees and get to relaxing in just one minute! It’s that fast.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
